name: nodenginx
description: Nodejs and nginx Docker image with quick proxying exernal hosts

scripts.patch: echo nodenginx:`shx cat package.json | json version`
scripts.tags: yarn tag:latest && yarn tag:patch && yarn tag:min && yarn tag:maj
scripts.push: yarn push:latest && yarn push:patch && yarn push:min && yarn push:maj
scripts.build: docker build --no-cache -t nodenginx:latest -t `yarn -s patch` -t `yarn -s min` -t `yarn -s maj` .
scripts.postversion: yarn run build && yarn run tags && yarn run push

author: Pavel Tereschenko <me@pavlik.pro> (https://github.com/bigslycat)
